conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Thank goodness you got me out of there! Another second of listening to that witch raving on and on about herself and I would've lost my mind!

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Seriously, how conceited can you be? That power wasn't even yours! You stole it from me! (The fairy stomps on the corpse of the red witch, though she only weighs like 2 ounces.)

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Whew~ glad to get that off my chest.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: I can feel my magic getting stronger. That means you must've already saved my sister, right? Oh, I can't thank you enough!

conversation.speaker: potion
conversation.text: You have receive a Strength Potion (doubles your damage for 7 seconds). Press [2] to use. This potion can be used once per stage.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Your next opponent is right ahead, Marusan the White. Unlike those two idiot sisters, she's no joke. She stole the Elder Faerie. Without her, the Fablewoods can never truly heal.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: But fear not, I know you can do it! I'll get back to my sister. The two of us will buy you some time.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: What's your name by the way, little soldier?

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: Mimi meow meow! (touched that finally someone cared to ask </3)

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Oh right, I can't understand you. Hm... I think I'll call you Mimi, the Magical Battlecat. I'll tell the folks back at home of your deeds. Go now! The battle isn't over yet.
